description: Engineers have transformed discarded crustacean shells into functional biohybrid robots by softening the shell segments, adding elastomers, and attaching motors. These recycled structures can lift weight, grasp delicate items, and even propel small swimmers. The project demonstrates how food waste can become a sustainable robotics resource, though challenges remain with natural shell variability.
title: Engineers Turn Lobster Shells Into Robot Parts That Lift, Grip and Swim

description: A powerful X5.1 solar flare on November 11, 2025, sent high-speed protons toward Earth, producing the strongest radiation spike detected in nearly two decades. The event caused a rare ground-level enhancement, briefly raising radiation at flight altitude to ten times normal. While not dangerous this time, scientists warn larger flares could threaten avionics and communication systems.
title: Strongest Solar Flare of 2025 Sends High-Energy Radiation Rushing Toward Earth

description: Bison Kaalamaadan, starring Dhruv Vikram, is now available on Netflix with an IMDb rating of 7.9/10. The film blends sports, social issues, and emotional storytelling, making it a must-watch for viewers who enjoy powerful rural dramas with strong performances and meaningful themes.
title: Bison Kaalamaadan Is Now Streaming: Know All About the Tamil Sports Action Drama

description: Nawazuddin Siddiqui leads the gripping sequel Raat Akeli Hai: The Bansal Murders, streaming on Netflix from December 19, 2025. With deeper emotions and a darker investigation, the film expands the world of the original thriller and promises a tense, atmospheric crime drama for global audiences.
title: Raat Akeli Hai: The Bansal Murders OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Nawazuddin Siddiqui Murder Mystery

description: Vivo's X300 series phones are all set to go on sale next week, starting December 10. Ahead of that, Gadgets 360 spoke exclusively with Vikas Tagra, Head of Product Management at Vivo, about the evolution of the X-series and the shift from curved screens to flat screens. Vikas also touched upon how AI is an enabler for hardware to bloom.
title: Beyond Megapixels: How Vivo’s X Series Evolved from the Gimbal to AI-Powered Storyboards

description: The series shows the conspiracy of unethical drug selling in which many high stake people are involved. It is a suspenseful story with lots of twists and turns and it stars with Nivin Pauly and other effective supporting roles.Pharma is an Indian techno-thriller that uncovers the shadowy world of medicine, morality and massive pharmaceutical power.
title: Pharma OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Malayalam Medical Thriller Web Series

description: The Government reportedly received a proposal from the Cellular Operators Association of India (COAI) in June, which stated that user locations should only be provided if always-on smartphone location tracking is mandated. However, as per the report, Apple, Google, and Samsung have objected to the proposal citing privacy concerns. Currently, neither MeitY or the Home Ministry has reportedly reached a decision.
title: Apple, Google and Samsung Reportedly Challenge India's New Proposal on Always-On Smartphone Location Tracking

description: Are you looking to buy a gaming laptop under Rs. 80,000 in India? Here are some capable options from brands like Dell, Acer, Lenovo and Asus. They balance CPU power, GPU performance, and high refresh rate display. All models run on the latest Intel processors and run Windows 11 Home out of the box. Shoppers are recommended to make the final decision after comparing the specifications and pricing.
title: Best Gaming Laptops Under Rs. 80,000 in India: Lenovo LOQ 15, Acer ALG, HP Victus and More

description: Rockstar Games launched Grand Theft Auto V (GTA V) in 2013. It has been over 12 years since the launch of the last GTA installment. While people have been patiently waiting for the game developer to release GTA 6, the company recently delayed the open-world game's launch for the second time. GTA 6 is expected to come to select consoles in November next year. However, its availability on PC has yet to be confirmed. If you wish to know whether your PC can run the upcoming video game, you might want to check out the expected system requirements.
title: GTA 6 PC System Requirements: Anticipated Specs, File Size and System Recommendations

description: Telegram Web lets you access your Telegram chats directly from a browser without installing a desktop app. It syncs with your phone in real time, making it easy to send messages, share files, and manage groups while working on a computer. You can log in quickly using a QR code or enter your phone number and confirm with a code sent to your app. Since Telegram Web runs entirely in a browser, setup is simple and requires no downloads.
title: How to Use Telegram Web: A Step-by-Step Guide
